displayName: City of Canonas, House of Moneylender Frimata
note:
<DOBBY_NOT_FASTTRAVEL>
<リージョン通行設定250:8>
<リージョン通行設定254:2>
<リージョン通行設定255:4>

parameters: Clea: It seems like no one is here, huh?

Young Boy Kalti: Do you need something? My father, Furimata,
is sick and sleeping.

Clea: I came from the Adventurer's Guild to report that the
debt collection has been completed.

Young Boy Kalti: Thank you very much. I will let my father
know.
Mage Relm: Oh, it's a book on magic, isn't it?
Young Boy Kalti: Huh... Yes, I've always admired mages.

Mage Relm: I see, I see! You want to become someone like me,
who belongs to the Magic Academy.

Young Boy Kalti: Oh, a mage from the Academy!? That's
amazing, even though you're so small, is it true?!

Mage Relm: I'll ignore the word 'small' this time, but
please choose your words carefully when speaking to this
genius in the future, okay?

Young Boy Kalti: Yes...! Um, could you please let me hear a
little bit of your story?
Young Boy Kalti: I will also prepare tea for everyone!

Mage Relm: Alright, alright. I'll give you a special lesson,
since I'm such a genius.

Mage Relm: First of all, what is magic? It is the technique
of harnessing the power of demons sealed within grimoires!

Mage Relm: In order to do that, understanding grimoires is
essential! That's why we mages are called readers of books.

Mage Relm: Mages are able to cast spells by deconstructing,
understanding, and unlocking the magical incantations
written in grimoires!

Mage Relm: It's not enough to just deconstruct, understand,
and unlock. A true mage is someone who can handle
everything, the achiever of the Three Unlocks.

Mage Relm: If you become a genius like me, you'll be able to
develop your own interpretation of magic circles and even
perform incantations!
Thief Nora: Ah~ Don't you feel sleepy for some reason?

Priestess Sophia: Well, you know... I'm not really good with
long stories. I remember getting scolded by Eleo-chan for
that...
Clea: ...Huh?! Um, yes, I'm fine, I'm not sleeping.

Young Caron: Thank you so much! I can't believe I get to
talk to a mage from the prestigious academy I've always
admired.

Mage Relm: If you have some free time, I can chat with you.
If you have any requests, please refer to me as Mage Relm
from the Magic Academy.

Young Caron: Thank you very much! If you don't mind, please
make use of this for your adventures!

Mage Relm: Well then, with this, the request is complete.
Shall we return to the Adventurer's Guild?

Young Boy Kalti: Is there something you need? My father,
Furimata, is sick and sleeping.

Young Boy Kalti: Please come by anytime! I think I can serve
you some tea at least.

Mage Relm: Now, let the lecture of the genius mage Relm
begin!
Young Boy Kalti: Yes! Nice to meet you!

Mage Relm: That's a good response! Well then, let's start
the lecture, including a review!
Do you want to listen to Mage Relm's lecture?

Mage Relm: The demons were sealed in a blank grimoire
created by the founder of mages, Subma.

Mage Relm: I define [magic] as the utilization of the power
of sealed demons.

Mage Relm: Magic books and magic are closely related. That's
why mages are called readers of books.

Young Boy Kalti: Professor Relm! Is it impossible to conduct
research without a magic book that seals demons?

Mage Relm: ...Professor, hehehe, this sound is wonderful,
isn't it?

Mage Relm: Oh my! For that reason, numerous manuscripts were
created.

Mage Relm: The original grimoires are managed and only
accessible to advanced magicians of the Magic Academy.

Mage Relm: Next, let's talk about the definition of a mage.
The definition of a mage is generally broad.

Mage Relm: Some people consider themselves mages if they can
chant spells or if they study magic.
Young Boy Kalti: Is it different at the Magic Academy?

Mage Relm: I define a mage as someone who is capable of
disassembling, understanding, and nullifying.

Mage Relm: However, there are also people who call
themselves researchers even if they can only do those three
things.

Mage Relm: Disassembling is the act of literally breaking
down the magic circles depicted in demon grimoires into
various elements.

Mage Relm: Next, understanding is necessary. We need to
understand the disassembled elements and select what is
necessary.

Mage Relm: Finally, it's the nullification. We determine the
range that can be safely operated and make it available for
use as magic.
Young Boy Kalti: It's quite difficult, isn't it...

Mage Relm: Yes, for example, let's say there is a magic
circle of a fire demon.

Mage Relm: Fire has various elements. We extract those
elements from the magic circle and complete the spell.

Mage Relm: Some people enhance fire to create flames, while
others enhance heat to generate high temperatures.

Mage Relm: At the Magic Academy, a mage is someone who can
create spells through the process of disassembling,
understanding, and nullifying magic circles...

Mage Relm: I define a mage as someone who is capable of
achieving the Three Unravelings. I was able to create simple
spells when I was around six years old.
Young Boy Kalti: ...Wow, you're truly a genius!

Mage Relm: Hehe, it's lucky for me to receive individual
guidance from someone who will leave their name in history
as a great genius!

Mage Relm: Now then, let me teach you how to read magic
circles.

Mage Relm: Let's end the lesson here today! Your sincere
attitude towards magic is wonderful.

Mage Relm: Please continue to strive and improve from now
on!

Young Boy Kalti: Yes, I am also learning from another
teacher, so I will strive to improve.

Mage Anat: Hehehe... You seem surprised, the great genius
mage Anat!
Thief Nora (I'm starting to get hungry...)
Mage Relm: ...Excuse me, but who was it again?

Mage Anat: I am the mage of the Great Rock Castle! I am the
victim whose family treasure was stolen by you!

Mage Relm: I remember now! That is something entrusted to
you by your father!
Mage Relm: Honestly... saying such unpleasant things...
Mage Anat: That aside... lend me your face for a moment.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
Young Boy Kalti: I will continue to study hard!

Young Boy Kalti: I will definitely become Lady Relm's
assistant! So please wait just a little longer!
Mage Relm: I'll be waiting eagerly, hehe.
Young Boy Kalti: Thank you very much for helping me!

I have heard about all of you from Kalti, the moneylending
flea market. Previously, you helped me with debt collection
in my place, and I am grateful for that.

Priestess Sophia: Are you alright? I heard that you're
sick...

Moneylending Flea Market: Moneylending is a sinful
occupation. Perhaps it is a punishment bestowed by the main
god, Sol.

Moneylending Flea Market: I requested your services because
I wanted you to be my son Kalti's private tutor.
Clea: You were very interested in magic, weren't you?

Moneylending Flea Market: That's right. If you grow up in
Kanonas, everyone aspires to become a magician.

Moneylending Flea Market: I have heard that there is a great
genius of magic among all of you, including my son.
Mage Relm: Yes, that's right. I am the great genius mage!

Moneylending Flea Market: That's wonderful! Please take care
of being my son's private tutor for a day.
Thief Nora: Relm-san, is something wrong?

Mage Relm: No... It's just rare for me to be praised so
straightforwardly.

Mage Relm: I'm not sure how to react... Well, if it's for a
genius like me, one day should be more than enough!
Mage Relm: Shall we start the lesson right away?
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

Loan Shark Flea Market: Thank goodness you came! It was a
good idea to post the request on bulletin boards throughout
the empire!

Clea: Could you please tell us the details? This request
might become a race against time.

Loan Shark Flea Market: Understood, please let me hear the
details.

Priestess Sophia: So, she suddenly disappeared from her
house... is that correct?

Loan Shark Flea Market: Yes, she left when she went to
borrow a magic book...

Loan Shark Flea Market: It's all my fault... I deserve
punishment for engaging in such a sinful occupation as money
lending--
Loan Shark Flea Market: Ahem, ahem!
Loan Shark Flea Market: I-I... my son... only he... ugh...

Priestess Sophia: You look terrible. It would be best for
you to rest.
Clea: Yes, Nora-san, let's carry Flea Market-san to the bed.

Clea: We have absolutely no information. Let's first search
for some clues.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

Lending Market Freema: I'm glad you're safe... but this
time, it's really--

Magician Relm (In the end, I came without being able to
convey it...)

Magician Relm (I need to convey it properly, for his sake
and for my own sake)
Magician Relm: I scolded you so much, please forgive me.

Magician Relm: More importantly, let me apologize for the
lies I told both of you.
Young Carti: I don't have any talent as a magician, do I...?

Young Carti: Even before Professor Anato told me, I had a
vague sense of it.

Young Carti: In the world of magic, it seems that there is
an absolute talent that cannot be filled by effort...
Magician Relm: Is that really okay...?

Young Carti: Being a magician is a job that helps many
people. I wanted to become someone who could be of use to
others.

Young Carti: So I will find another way. I'm really sorry
for causing trouble.

Magician Relm: Even if being a magician is impossible, there
are still jobs related to magic.

Young Carti: I don't need gentle lies anymore, ahaha. I'm
sorry for making you worry.

Magician Relm: There are specialized professions that assist
magicians, such as researchers and assistants, who are also
present in the academy.

Magician Relm: It's true that I don't have any talent for
understanding magic, but having a sincere attitude towards
knowledge is a commendable talent.
Young Carti: I can also be involved with magic...!

Magician Relm: The Magic Academy is always seeking talented
researchers and assistants.
Magician Relm: What you do next is up to you, Carti-kun.
Young Carti: Yes, thank you very much!

Loan Shark Furimata: Thank you very much for this
opportunity. I feel like my son has become somewhat more
manly.

Magician Relm: I'll be cheering for you. I'll join up with
my friends then.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

Loan Frimata: 'My son has found a new dream. I can't let
myself be defeated by something like illness.'

events.name: EV013金貸フリマタ優しい魔法

parameters:
Mage Relm: It seems to be a diary. It feels a bit awkward to
read someone else's diary, but I guess there's no helping
it.
Today, I had a lesson with Professor Anato and Lady Relm.

Professor Anato said that I don't have any talent for magic,
but Lady Relm told me that there is a possibility for me to
grow.

I still can't even understand basic magic circles as of the
◯th of △ month.
I wonder if Professor Anato's words were correct?

On the ◯th of ✗ month, what I lack is definitely an
opportunity to grow.

I'm thinking of challenging myself to seize an opportunity
to grow as a magician without my father knowing.
Clea: Do you think there might be any clues?

Mage Relm: At the very least, it doesn't seem to be a
kidnapping. However, it doesn't mention where they went.

Clea: Let's gather information. If it's someone from
Kanonas, there's a possibility they might have witnessed
something.

Mage Relm (I have to take my words seriously... I must
definitely find Karti-kun)
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
